description: Generalized least squares time series fit, with REML estimation of the temporal auto-correlation structure

regression_matrix.title: Regression matrix
regression_matrix.description: Read the regression matrix, which should have been output from 3dDeconvolve via the '-x1D' option

baseline_files.title: Baseline files
baseline_files.description: Add baseline model columns to the matrix. Each column in the specified .1D file will be appended to the matrix.

sort_nods.title: Sort NoDS flag
sort_nods.description: If '-dsort' is used, the output datasets reflect the impact of the voxel-wise regressor(s). If you want to compare those results to the case where you did NOT give the '-dsort' option, then also use '-dsort_nods'.

temp_storage.title: Temporary storage flag
temp_storage.description: Write intermediate output to disk, to economize on RAM.

mask.title: Mask file
mask.description: Read dataset as a mask for the input; voxels outside the mask will not be fit by the regression model.

output_prefix.title: Output prefix
output_prefix.description: Dataset prefix for saving REML variance parameters.

no_fdr_curve.title: No FDR curve
no_fdr_curve.description: Do not add FDR curve data to bucket datasets.

go_for_it.title: Go For It
go_for_it.description: Force the program to continue past a failed collinearity check.

max_a_param.title: Maximum a parameter
max_a_param.description: Set max allowed AR a parameter.

max_b_param.title: Maximum b parameter
max_b_param.description: Set max allowed MA b parameter.

grid_param.title: Grid parameter
grid_param.description: Set the number of grid divisions in the (a,b) grid.

negative_corr.title: Negative correlation
negative_corr.description: Allows negative correlations to be used.
